subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[put]] [[together]]; to [[assemble]]; to [[gather]]
# to [[synthesise]]; to [[sum up]]
# to [[manage]]; to [[administer]]
# to be [[proficient]] in
# {{zh-classifier|[[thread]]s or [[hair]]s|t=[[strand]]}}
# to [[become]] [[crumpled]]; to [[crease]]
